mainDescription.message: This extension is mainly used to obtain the information of the currently logged-in Twitter user and authorize it for SpotlightX-App

description.message: This extension is mainly used to obtain the information of the currently logged-in Twitter user and authorize it for SpotlightX-App. The user information is only transmitted through a QR code and will not go through any server. Please use it with confidence.

scanQR.message: Please scan the QR code with the APP
